contentrichtext.text: :''For the village in northern Jabrayil Rayon, see [[Khalafli]].'' {{coord|39|10|17|N|47|00|24|E|display=title}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name =Xələfli |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Jabrayil Rayon|Jabrayil]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of =2008 |population_total =744 |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=39 |latm=10 |lats=17 |latNS=N |longd=47|longm=00 |longs=24 |longEW=E |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xələfli''' (also, '''Kalafli''' and '''Khalafli''') is a village in the [[Jabrayil Rayon]] of [[Azerbaijan]]. == References == *{{GEOnet2|32FA88150FD23774E0440003BA962ED3}} *[http://world-gazetteer.com/wg.php?x=&men=gcis&lng=en&des=wg&geo=-26&srt=npan&col=abcdefghinoq&msz=1500&pt=c&va=x World Gazetteer: Azerbaijan] – World-Gazetteer.com *{{ADG|000e23}} {{Jabrayil Rayon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xelefli}} [[Category:Populated places in Jabrayil District]] {{Jabrayil-geo-stub}}
